items.caption: Get a Quote
items.title: Easily request a quote before booking your cleaning service
items.description: You can request a quote before booking your service. While the quote provides an estimated cost, you can choose to be contacted by our team for an exact price after receiving it.

items.caption: Book a Service
items.title: Book a service by filling in the necessary details
items.description: You can book a service after receiving a quote, or skip the quote and directly book the service. Our team will contact you to finalize the details.

items.caption: Contact Us
items.title: Schedule Your Service by Providing the Required Details
items.description: If you prefer not to book online, you can reach us by phone, provide your details, and our team will assist you promptly.
